John Anderson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Anderson_(actor) 0 John Robert Anderson (October 20, 1922 – August 7, 1992) was an American character actor. John_Robert_Anderson ( October_20_,_1922 – August_7_,_1992 ) was an_American_character_actor .
